name: METAPIXEL
introduce: METAPIXEL is a gaming ecosystem built on the Aptos network to bring MMORG fantasy Web3 games. According to the team, METAPIXEL's greatest strength is NPIXEL's expertise in developing world-class games. NPIXEL is a game company known for becoming the fastest unicorn in the Korean gaming industry's history. The first game that Metapixel will bring is Gran Saga, followed by the upcoming Chrono Odyssey.
